title: RSS Men Held For Terror-Related Activities? No, It’s a Mock Drill
subtitle: A video is being circulated on Facebook which shows armed police holding a few men at gun point. The text of the video claims that 25 RSS men were caught making bombs from the hostel of Maharashtra University and 58 rooms of the hostel is sealed.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
While the video is absolutely true, the claim with which it is being shared along with it is false. The Quint got in touch with the Amravati police and they confirmed to us that the video was shot during a mock drill and it doesn’t show the police arresting RSS men.

A different version of the same video had gone viral earlier, which claimed that the police arrested these terrorists from Ambadevi Temple. The Quint had earlier debunked that viral story too.
